short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below
description: The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt, British Colombia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Valve and Stop-Check Valve Components**
================================================================================Archive Date 2024-01-15
================================================================================
### Tender Information

* **Reference:** cb-56-67648715
* **Solicitation Number:** W8482-242357/A
* **Contracting Authority:** Directorate Maritime Procurement
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Procurement Overview

The Canadian Department of National Defence invites proposals for the delivery of valve and stop-check valve components to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt, British Columbia, and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. The procurement is conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and bidders may propose an equivalent or substitute product.

### Procurement Details

* **Item 1: Valve, Stop-Check**
	+ Quantity: 20
	+ NSN: 21-908-2569
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* **Item 2: Valve, Stop-Check**
	+ Quantity: 20
	+ NSN: 21-909-4639
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Item 3: Valve, Check**
	+ Quantity: 27
	+ NSN: 21-909-4639
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* **Item 4: Valve, Check**
	+ Quantity: 27
	+ NSN: 21-909-4639
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

### Bidder Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, or part number, and National Codification Bureau (NCAGE) code of the product offered.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Tender Documents

The full tender document is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26646/rfp-w8482-242357-a-en_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
